recipe_name: Deep-fried tortillas with red pepper sauce
author: Phil Vickery
method: For the deep-fried tortillas, place the vegetable oil into a deep, heavy-bottomed saucepan and heat until a small cube of bread sizzles and turns golden when dropped into it. (CAUTION: hot oil can be dangerous. Do not leave unattended.) Carefully place the tortilla triangles into the hot oil and deep fry until golden.  Remove with a slotted spoon and drain on kitchen paper.  Pile into a large serving bowl. For the red pepper sauce, place the red peppers and the olive oil in a small blender and blend until smooth. Stir in the Greek-style yoghurt.  Pour the sauce into a small bowl and serve with the tortillas.
